description: Manual configuration for AdaptiveV6Combiner with improved negation handling
notes: negation_boost=1.5: Amplify negative scores when negation detected
modifier_quality_weight=0.25: Weight modifier contribution by quality assessment
adaptive_mod_strong_weight=0.7: When modifiers are stronger than head
adaptive_mod_weak_weight=0.4: When modifiers are weaker than head
adaptive_head_weak_weight=0.6: Complement to mod_weak (head gets more weight)
